text: Alexa won't respond to wake word on Echo Dot. Blue light ring doesn't activate. Device firmware 1.6.8, tried factory reset already.
Wake word failure after factory reset suggests microphone hardware issue. Check microphone holes aren't blocked, test with different wake word.
Shopping app login keeps failing. Password correct (works on website). Cleared cache, reinstalled app twice. Echo Show iOS 3.7.5.
App login failure while website works indicates keychain issue on iOS. Disable autofill, manually type credentials, update app to latest version.
Kindle books won't download. Error says 'device not registered' but account shows device registered. Fire Tablet OS version 4.7.4.
Device registration desync. Deregister device completely from account, factory reset Kindle, re-register with Amazon account credentials.
Amazon Photos app won't backup photos on Samsung Galaxy S22 running Android 13. Auto-backup enabled, WiFi connected, 50GB free storage.
Backup failure with enabled auto-backup means permission issue. Check app permissions for camera, storage, background data on Android 13.
